content.text:
# Draft:Edward James Farrell

Edward James Farrell (usually abbreviated to EJ Farrell) is a Trinidadian born mathematician specializing in
* Discrete Mathematics
* Graph Theory
* Combinatorial Algorithms
* Graph Polynomials
He is professor emeritus at the University of the West Indies Department of Mathematics and Statistics.
He is known for the Farrell-Polynomial (F-Polynomial).
